projects.quote: A fully responsive weather website built using React and an external API. It shows real-time weather data including temperature, wind speed, humidity, and UV index.
projects.name: Weather App
projects.title: Real-time Weather Forecast with React

projects.quote: A web platform to connect students with home tutors. Teachers can register their availability and rates, while students can find suitable tutors. The app includes a 10% commission system and admin panel.
projects.name: TutorConnect
projects.title: Student-Tutor Matching Platform
